description: MutatingWebhookConfiguration describes the configuration of an admission webhook that accepts or rejects and may change an object. Deprecated in v1.16, planned for removal in v1.19. Use admissionregistration.k8s.io/v1 MutatingWebhookConfiguration instead.

apiVersion.description: apiVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.

kind.description: A string value representing the REST resource this object represents.

webhooks.description: A list of webhooks and the affected resources and operations.
